languages.text: "Как святой Друз принял мученическую смерть и возродился в вере, так же и мы ищем очищающую силу в страданиях и испытаниях". {n}Из складок черной рясы Иеронимус достает тонкую брошюру.{/n} "Прочти это. Здесь азы нашей догмы. Возможно, и ты почувствуешь истину в словах святого Друза".

traits.locale_text: "Как святой Друз принял мученическую смерть и возродился в вере, так же и мы ищем очищающую силу в страданиях и испытаниях". {n}Из складок черной рясы Иеронимус достает тонкую брошюру.{/n} "Прочти это. Здесь азы нашей догмы. Возможно, и ты почувствуешь истину в словах святого Друза".
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Just as Saint Drusus found his martyr's death and was reborn in faith, so do we search for the purifying power of trials and suffering." {n}From the folds of his black robe, he produces a thin pamphlet.{/n} "Read this. It contains the basics of our dogma. Perhaps you too will sense the truth in Saint Drusus's words."
languages.original_text: "Как святой Друз принял мученическую смерть и возродился в вере, так же и мы ищем очищающую силу в страданиях и испытаниях". {n}Из складок черной рясы Иеронимус достает тонкую брошюру.{/n} "Прочти это. Здесь азы нашей догмы. Возможно, и ты почувствуешь истину в словах святого Друза".

It contains the basics of our dogma. Perhaps you too will sense the truth in Saint Drusus's words."

It contains the basics of our dogma. Perhaps you too will sense the truth in Saint Drusus's words."

traits.locale_text: "Just as Saint Drusus found his martyr's death and was reborn in faith, so do we search for the purifying power of trials and suffering." {n}From the folds of his black robe, he produces a thin pamphlet.{/n} "Read this. It contains the basics of our dogma. Perhaps you too will sense the truth in Saint Drusus's words."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: “圣德鲁苏斯最终以身殉道，而他的名字在信仰中重生。我们效仿他的榜样，也在通过试炼与苦难寻找净化精神的力量。”{n}他从黑色长袍的褶皱中掏出一本薄薄的小册子。{/n}“读读这个吧，上面写了我们教义的基本内容。或许你也能感受到圣德鲁苏斯教诲中的真理。”
languages.original_text: "Just as Saint Drusus found his martyr's death and was reborn in faith, so do we search for the purifying power of trials and suffering." {n}From the folds of his black robe, he produces a thin pamphlet.{/n} "Read this. It contains the basics of our dogma. Perhaps you too will sense the truth in Saint Drusus's words."

traits.locale_text: “圣德鲁苏斯最终以身殉道，而他的名字在信仰中重生。我们效仿他的榜样，也在通过试炼与苦难寻找净化精神的力量。”{n}他从黑色长袍的褶皱中掏出一本薄薄的小册子。{/n}“读读这个吧，上面写了我们教义的基本内容。或许你也能感受到圣德鲁苏斯教诲中的真理。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: «Al igual que san Drusus encontró la muerte como mártir y renació en la fe, nosotros buscamos el poder purificador de la angustia y el sufrimiento». {n}Saca un fino folleto de uno de los pliegues de su túnica negra.{/n} «Lea esto: es una introducción a nuestro dogma. Quién sabe, quizá vislumbre la verdad en las palabras de san Drusus».
languages.original_text: "Just as Saint Drusus found his martyr's death and was reborn in faith, so do we search for the purifying power of trials and suffering." {n}From the folds of his black robe, he produces a thin pamphlet.{/n} "Read this. It contains the basics of our dogma. Perhaps you too will sense the truth in Saint Drusus's words."

traits.locale_text: «Al igual que san Drusus encontró la muerte como mártir y renació en la fe, nosotros buscamos el poder purificador de la angustia y el sufrimiento». {n}Saca un fino folleto de uno de los pliegues de su túnica negra.{/n} «Lea esto: es una introducción a nuestro dogma. Quién sabe, quizá vislumbre la verdad en las palabras de san Drusus».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: 「聖ドルススが殉死を遂げて信仰の元に生まれ変わったように、我々も試練と苦難の浄化の力を追求しています」 {n}彼は黒いローブの折り目から薄い冊子を取り出した。{/n}「これを読んでください。我々の教義の基本が書かれています。あなたも、聖ドルススの言葉に真実を見出すかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "Just as Saint Drusus found his martyr's death and was reborn in faith, so do we search for the purifying power of trials and suffering." {n}From the folds of his black robe, he produces a thin pamphlet.{/n} "Read this. It contains the basics of our dogma. Perhaps you too will sense the truth in Saint Drusus's words."

traits.locale_text: 「聖ドルススが殉死を遂げて信仰の元に生まれ変わったように、我々も試練と苦難の浄化の力を追求しています」 {n}彼は黒いローブの折り目から薄い冊子を取り出した。{/n}「これを読んでください。我々の教義の基本が書かれています。あなたも、聖ドルススの言葉に真実を見出すかもしれません」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Und genau wie der Hl. Drusus den Tod als Märtyrer fand und im Glauben wiedergeboren wurde, so suchen wir nach der reinigenden Kraft von Prüfungen und Leid." {n}Aus den Falten seiner schwarzen Robe zieht er ein dünnes Heftchen.{/n} "Lest das. Es enthält die Grundlagen unseres Dogmas. Vielleicht erkennt dann auch Ihr die Wahrheit in den Worten des Hl. Drusus."
languages.original_text: "Just as Saint Drusus found his martyr's death and was reborn in faith, so do we search for the purifying power of trials and suffering." {n}From the folds of his black robe, he produces a thin pamphlet.{/n} "Read this. It contains the basics of our dogma. Perhaps you too will sense the truth in Saint Drusus's words."

traits.locale_text: "Und genau wie der Hl. Drusus den Tod als Märtyrer fand und im Glauben wiedergeboren wurde, so suchen wir nach der reinigenden Kraft von Prüfungen und Leid." {n}Aus den Falten seiner schwarzen Robe zieht er ein dünnes Heftchen.{/n} "Lest das. Es enthält die Grundlagen unseres Dogmas. Vielleicht erkennt dann auch Ihr die Wahrheit in den Worten des Hl. Drusus."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: « À l'instar de Saint Drusus, qui a connu le martyre dans la mort avant de renaître dans la foi, nous sommes en quête du pouvoir purificateur de l'épreuve et de la souffrance. » {n}Il sort un fin livret des plis de sa tunique noire.{/n} « Lisez ceci. Vous y trouverez les bases de notre dogme. À votre tour, peut-être verrez-vous la vérité des paroles de Saint Drusus. »
languages.original_text: "Just as Saint Drusus found his martyr's death and was reborn in faith, so do we search for the purifying power of trials and suffering." {n}From the folds of his black robe, he produces a thin pamphlet.{/n} "Read this. It contains the basics of our dogma. Perhaps you too will sense the truth in Saint Drusus's words."

traits.locale_text: « À l'instar de Saint Drusus, qui a connu le martyre dans la mort avant de renaître dans la foi, nous sommes en quête du pouvoir purificateur de l'épreuve et de la souffrance. » {n}Il sort un fin livret des plis de sa tunique noire.{/n} « Lisez ceci. Vous y trouverez les bases de notre dogme. À votre tour, peut-être verrez-vous la vérité des paroles de Saint Drusus. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Nasıl Aziz Drusus şehit olmuş ve inançla yeniden doğmuşsa biz de sınavların ve ızdırabın arındırıcı gücünün arayışındayız." {n}Siyah cübbesinin kolundan ince bir kitapçık çıkarıyor.{/n} "Bunu oku. İnancımızın temellerini içeriyor. Belki Aziz Drusus'un kelamındaki hakikati sen de görebilirsin."
languages.original_text: "Just as Saint Drusus found his martyr's death and was reborn in faith, so do we search for the purifying power of trials and suffering." {n}From the folds of his black robe, he produces a thin pamphlet.{/n} "Read this. It contains the basics of our dogma. Perhaps you too will sense the truth in Saint Drusus's words."

traits.locale_text: "Nasıl Aziz Drusus şehit olarak ölmüş ve inancı sayesinde yeniden doğmuşsa, biz de sınavların ve acıların arındırıcı gücünün arayışındayız." {n}Siyah cübbesinin kolundan ince bir kitapçık çıkarıyor.{/n} "Bunu oku. İnancımızın temellerini içeriyor. Belki Aziz Drusus'un kelâmındaki gerçeği sen de görebilirsin."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian
